snippet: Russia’s use of its military in Ukraine has given Senator Marco Rubio of Florida an opening to emerge as a new foreign policy voice of the Republican Party.
abstract: Florida Sen Marco Rubio, hoping to set himself apart from crowd of possible candidates for 2016 Republican presidential nomination, proposes eight specific steps for Pres Obama to take in response to Russia's 'grave violation' of national sovereignty in its invasion of Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s use of its military in Ukraine has given Senator Marco Rubio of Florida an opening to emerge as a new foreign policy voice of the Republican Party.

headline.main: Rubio Proposes Steps U.S. Should Take With Russia
headline.print_headline: Rubio Proposes Steps U.S. Should Take With Russia
